creator: jyrki@kruu.org
text:
The included patch makes mod_autoindex's output valid xhtml 1.1 and gives some
support for CSS stylesheets while using HTMLTable output. To be more specific,
it puts class="sortby" to appropriate table cells and formats the resulting HTML
a bit. (The inner beauty? :)

And some URLs:
http://www.kruu.org/jvtm/apache/mod_autoindex-xhtml_and_css-2.0.45.diff the patch
http://www.kruu.org/jvtm/apache/mod_autoindex.css sample CSS file, put to
document root
http://www.kruu.org/jvtm/apache/mod_autoindex.png sample screenshot

Created attachment 5692
patch for mod_autoindex to output css-able xhtml
creator: jyrki@kruu.org
dpejesh@yahoo.com
text: Both XHTML output and support for CSS has been committed.
